cat_paw_kr_purchase_success_message: You may check your purchase through [Store > History of Purchase]. Click HERE to see the Notification related to the following purchase. Please confirm the information above. Thank you for the purchase.
cat_paw_charity_default_disclaimer: For every purchase of Promotional Products, Riot will contribute part of the proceeds to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund
cat_paw_charity_2020_impactassets_discla: For every purchase of Promotional Products, Riot will contribute 20% of proceeds to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a donor advised fund account sponsored by ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_charity_2021_july_impactassets_d: For every purchase of Promotional Products from July 8, 2021 to 1 p.m. PT on August 9, 2021, Riot will contribute 100% of proceeds to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund in partnership with ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_charity_msi_2022_default_disclai: For every purchase of Promotional Products from May 12 to June 13, Riot will contribute 25% of proceeds to the MSI prize pool.
cat_paw_charity_msi_2022_impactassets_ta: For every purchase of Promotional Products from May 12 to June 13, Riot will contribute 25% of proceeds to the MSI prize pool.
cat_paw_charity_star_guardian_2022_event: For every purchase of the Event Pass from July 14 to August 15, 2022, Riot will contribute 20% of proceeds to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund in partnership with ImpactAssets.

For every purchase of the Event Pass bundle from July 14 to August 15, 2022, Riot will contribute 20% of proceeds from the Event Pass to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund in partnership with ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_charity_star_guardian_2022_taliy: For every purchase of Star Guardian Taliyah from 28 July to 29 August, 2022 Riot will contribute 100% of proceeds to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund in partnership with ImpactAssets.
For every purchase of Star Guardian Taliyah Border Set from 28 July to 29 August, 2022 Riot will contribute 100% of proceeds to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund in partnership with ImpactAssets.
For every purchase of Star Guardian Taliyah Chroma Bundle from 28 July to 29 August, 2022, Riot will contribute 100% of proceeds to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund in partnership with ImpactAssets.

For every purchase of Star Guardian Taliyah All-Star Bundle from 28 July to 29 August, 2022, Riot will contribute 100% of proceeds to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund in partnership with ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_loyalty_unlocked_hint: To purchase a skin you must own the champion. This champion is unlocked via a Rewards Program but not owned.
cat_paw_charity_2023_impactassets_sf_dis: For every purchase of the Event Pass from July 20 - August 28, 2023, Riot will contribute 20% of proceeds to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a donor advised fund account sponsored by ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_charity_2023_impactassets_sfbund: For every purchase of the Event Pass bundle from July 20 - August 28, 2023, Riot will contribute 20% of proceeds from the Event Pass to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a donor advised fund account sponsored by ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_charity_2023_impactassets_sfsami: For every purchase of Soul Fighter Samira from July 20 - August 28, 2023, Riot will contribute 20% of proceeds to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a donor advised fund account sponsored by ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_charity_2023_impactassets_sfboun: For every purchase of the Unmatched Bounty Hunter Bundle from July 20 - August 28, 2023, Riot will contribute 20% of proceeds to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a donor advised fund account sponsored by ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_charity_2024_impactassets_neeko_: For every purchase of Cosplayer Neeko from October 9 - October 28, 2024, Riot will contribute 100% of proceeds, as well as a 3x match, to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a donor advised fund account sponsored by ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_charity_2024_impactassets_gragas: For every purchase of Music Fan Gragas from October 9 - October 28, 2024, Riot will contribute 100% of proceeds, as well as a 3x match, to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a donor advised fund account sponsored by ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_charity_2024_impactassets_trundl: For every purchase of Esports Fan Trundle from October 9 - October 28, 2024, Riot will contribute 100% of proceeds, as well as a 3x match, to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a donor advised fund account sponsored by ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_rp_error_message: An unexpected error occured. Please go to the store to buy more RP. Error Code: {{errorCode}}.
cat_paw_bundle_tos_disclaimer: I've read the Terms of Service and accept it
cat_paw_charity_2025_firefighter_tristan: For every purchase of Firefighter Tristana from January 23 - February 5, 2025, Riot will contribute 100% of proceeds, as well as a 3x match, to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a donor advised fund account sponsored by ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_charity_2025_battle_academia_xay: Riot will share a portion of proceeds with LoL Esports teams.
cat_paw_charity_2025_panda_pal_lux_discl: For every purchase of Panda Pal Lux from Nov 5 - Dec 3, Riot will contribute 100% of proceeds, as well as a 2x match, to the Riot Games Social Impact Fund, a donor advised fund account sponsored by ImpactAssets.
cat_paw_charity_lol_esports_disclaimer: Riot will share a portion of proceeds with LoL Esports teams.
